references.paper_title: Bilateral reference for high-resolution dichotomous image segmentation
references.reason: This paper proposes a bilateral reference framework for high-resolution dichotomous image segmentation, enhancing performance by capturing intricate details.
This paper introduces a highly accurate method for dichotomous image segmentation, serving as a benchmark for the DIS5K dataset.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, a technique leveraged in MaskFactory for image generation.

references.paper_title: DatasetDM: Synthesizing data with perception annotations using diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces DatasetDM, a method for synthesizing data with perception annotations using diffusion models, a competing method compared against in MaskFactory.

references.paper_title: Dataset diffusion: Diffusion-based synthetic data generation for pixel-level semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces Dataset Diffusion, another competing method compared against in MaskFactory, for generating synthetic data using diffusion models.
